definition: To converge or flow together, typically used to describe the merging of two or more rivers or streams.

examples.german: Die beiden Flüsse münden hier in den See.
examples.english: The two rivers flow into the lake here.

examples.german: Der Bach mündet in den Fluss.
examples.english: The stream empties into the river.
The river flows into the sea.

examples.german: Die Straße mündet in einen Kreisverkehr.
examples.english: The road leads into a roundabout.

examples.german: Der Wanderweg mündet am Gipfel des Berges.
examples.english: The hiking trail ends at the summit of the mountain.
